From Canvas to Interfaces

I Am Sayak here

I Started My UX Design Journey In 2019 At DIT University, Where I Completed My Bachelor's In Design With A Specialization In UI/UX. Currently, I'm Pursuing My Master's In Interaction & UX Design At Lovely Professional University. Along This Journey, I Have Also Published A Research Paper, Reflecting My Dedication To Combining Academic Insights With Practical Design.

My Professional Journey

I Completed My Internship At Apka Kisan Agrotech Pvt. Ltd., Where I Gained Hands-On Experience In UI/UX Design While Addressing Real-World Challenges. From Analysing The Website To Developing Packaging Concepts, I Enhanced My Creative And Analytical Skills. This Experience Deepened My Passion For User-Centred Design And Prepared Me For Future Professional Opportunities
